description:
National or state offense totals are based on data from all reporting agencies and estimates for unreported areas.																				Rates are the number of reported offenses per 100,000 population.
Offense Crimes Include: Violent crime (Murder and non-negligent manslaughter, forcible rape, robbery, and aggravated assault) & Property crime (Burglary, larceny-theft, and motor vehicle theft).

name: Crime Rates 1980-2012
